title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1ยง 5.3 - The handling of mixtures, milk rinsings, milk drippings and whey
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1ยง 5.3 - The handling of mixtures, milk rinsings, milk drippings and whey

State Regulations

Mixtures, milk rinsings, milk drippings and whey to be used
for human consumption or from which milk fat or other milk solids to be used
for human consumptions are recovered shall be utilized or separated promptly
after collection and from the time of collection until so utilized or separated
shall be maintained at a temperature not higher than 60 degrees

Fahrenheit. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1ยง
5.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
